Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100 to you. Considering its true worth, I propose a special introductory price of $120 for you today. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, and I'm confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the exceptional value of our product. Let me know if you're interested, and we can proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
